member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the source content is being recorded to a file.

member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control is in snapshot preview mode.

member.summary: Gets or sets whether the control will go into preview mode when a snapshot is taken.

member.summary: Gets or sets whether the control will start the first webcam it finds upon starting the application.

member.summary: Gets or sets the height of the panel with the camera controls.

member.name: P:Telerik.WinControls.UI.RadWebCam.RecordingFilePath
member.summary: Gets or sets the location where video files are stored when capturing.

member.name: P:Telerik.WinControls.UI.RadWebCam.VideoRecordingElapsedTimeFormat
member.summary: Gets or sets the format of the elapsed time displayed during recording.

member.summary: Gets a list with all the available audio capture devices.

member.summary: Gets a list with all the available video capture devices.

member.name: M:Telerik.WinControls.UI.RadWebCam.GetVideoFormats(Telerik.Windows.MediaFoundation.MediaFoundationDeviceInfo,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Gets a list with all the available video file formats for the provided device.
member.param: The device for which to get the available formats.
If set to true - only formats that allow saving to a video file will be returned.

member.name: M:Telerik.WinControls.UI.RadWebCam.Initialize(Telerik.Windows.MediaFoundation.MediaFoundationDeviceInfo,Telerik.Windows.MediaFoundation.MediaFoundationVideoFormatInfo)
member.summary: Starts up the video pipeline and displays the video from the source inside of the control. The device to use as a video source. The format from the video source.

member.name: M:Telerik.WinControls.UI.RadWebCam.Initialize(Telerik.Windows.MediaFoundation.MediaFoundationDeviceInfo,Telerik.Windows.MediaFoundation.MediaFoundationVideoFormatInfo,Telerik.Windows.MediaFoundation.MediaFoundationDeviceInfo)
member.summary: Starts up the video pipeline and displays the video from the source inside of the control. The device to use as a video source. The format from the video source. The device to use as a audio source.

member.name: M:Telerik.WinControls.UI.RadWebCam.ShutDown
member.summary: Shuts down the video pipeline.

member.name: M:Telerik.WinControls.UI.RadWebCam.Start
member.summary: Starts the video pipeline and starts displaying the video feed.

member.name: M:Telerik.WinControls.UI.RadWebCam.Pause
member.summary: Pauses the video pipeline and pauses displaying the video feed.

member.name: M:Telerik.WinControls.UI.RadWebCam.Stop
member.summary: Stops the video pipeline and stops displaying the video feed.

member.name: M:Telerik.WinControls.UI.RadWebCam.StartRecording
member.summary: Starts capturing the media source(s) to a file. The property must be set before calling this method.

member.name: M:Telerik.WinControls.UI.RadWebCam.StopRecording
member.summary: Stops the file capture.

member.name: M:Telerik.WinControls.UI.RadWebCam.TakeSnapshot
member.summary: Takes a snapshot from the currently displayed video feed. To get the snapshot subscribe to the event.

member.name: M:Telerik.WinControls.UI.RadWebCam.SaveSnapshot
member.summary: Triggers the event when the control is in preview snapshot mode.

member.name: M:Telerik.WinControls.UI.RadWebCam.DiscardSnapshot
member.summary: Discards the taken snapshot when the control is in preview snapshot mode.

member.name: M:Telerik.WinControls.UI.RadWebCam.ShowSettingsDialog
member.summary: Shows the camera settings dialog.

member.name: M:Telerik.WinControls.UI.RadWebCam.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the System.Windows.Forms.Control and its child controls and optionally releases the managed resources.

member.name: P:Telerik.WinControls.UI.RadWebCam.DefaultSize
member.summary: Gets the default size of the control.

member.name: M:Telerik.WinControls.UI.RadWebCam.StartRecordingCore
member.summary: Starts capturing the content of the source(s) to a file. This call must be made in a new thread as Windows Media Foundation must run in a MTAThread and WPF is STAThread.

member.name: M:Telerik.WinControls.UI.RadWebCam.StopRecordingCore
member.summary: Stops capturing the content of the source(s) to a file. This call must be made in a new thread as Windows Media Foundation must run in a MTAThread and WPF is STAThread.

member.name: M:Telerik.WinControls.UI.RadWebCam.InvalidatePlayerPosition
member.summary: Invalidates the rectangle where the MF player paints the webcam stream.

member.name: E:Telerik.WinControls.UI.RadWebCam.SnapshotTaken
member.summary: Occurs when a snapshot is taken. If is set to true the event is fired only if the SaveSnapshot button is pressed.
